query.mssql: create table {0} ([ReportSessionId] varchar(256) NOT NULL, [Id] int NULL, [DocName] nvarchar(max) NULL, [Comment] nvarchar(max) NULL, [Format] nvarchar(max) NULL, [SendingDate] nvarchar(max) NULL, [RecievingDate] nvarchar(max) NULL)
query.postgres: create table {0} (ReportSessionId citext NOT NULL, Id int NULL, DocName citext NULL, Comment citext NULL, Format citext NULL, SendingDate citext NULL, RecievingDate citext NULL)

query.default: select * from Sungero_Reports_InternalInventory temp where ReportSessionId = @ReportSessionId order by Id
